summary: Verified all new features: 1) Mobile hamburger menu includes Gift History, Notifications, Wallet, Profile, Settings - PASS, 2) Featured Talents shows 12 random profiles (within 8-16 limit) - PASS, 3) Message button on talent profile creates/opens conversation - PASS, 4) Messages page allows sending messages - PASS, 5) Cloudinary signature API returns valid signatures with proper validation - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Mobile Hamburger Menu: All required items present - Home, Browse Talents, Bookings, Messages, Favorites, Gift History, Wallet, Notifications, Profile, Settings
Featured Talents: Random selection working correctly, showing 12 talents (within 8-16 range)
Messaging Flow: Message button on talent profile successfully creates conversation and navigates to messages page
Real-time Messaging: Messages sent successfully, conversation auto-selected from URL parameter
Cloudinary Signature API: Returns valid signatures for image/video uploads with proper folder validation
Cloudinary Delete API: Requires authentication (returns 401 for unauthenticated requests) - correct behavior
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from iteration 22 verified: 1) Mobile hamburger menu has all nav items including Gift History and Notifications, 2) Featured Talents shows random 8-16 profiles (tested with 12), 3) Message button on talent profile creates/opens conversation, 4) Messages page supports real-time messaging with Supabase, 5) Cloudinary integration working - signature endpoint returns valid signatures, delete endpoint requires auth. MediaManager component uses Cloudinary for uploads with progress indicator.

mobile_hamburger_menu.data_testid_used: mobile-nav-more, mobile-menu-gift-history, mobile-menu-notifications, mobile-menu-wallet, mobile-menu-profile, mobile-menu-settings

featured_talents.randomization: Working - different talents shown on each page load

messaging_feature.message_button: Visible on talent profile with data-testid='message-button'
messaging_feature.conversation_creation: Creates new conversation or opens existing one
